Text:
Another great one, you just rock johnefp!!!!!
Keep'em coming!
thanks loads

Jean's last.
 Prior to finishing film, Ms. Harlow died of acute renal failure (kidneys).
You can see that there are stand-ins for the parts that had not been shot yet.
  But the most heart-rending part is that the negligee that she is wearing in the scene where Gable is rubbing linement on her in her train car.  She was buried in that negligee before the month was over.
Taken too soon, but has given so much
